mapper.select: SELECT news.id, news.title, news.preview, news.date, news.image, news.link, news.provider, news.readcnt, news.similarnews, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode = social_corporations.code WHERE social_corporations.code=#{corpCode} AND date=#{newsDate} ORDER BY news.readcnt DESC, news.id ASC LIMIT #{page}, 5

SELECT news.id, news.title, news.preview, news.date, news.image, news.link, news.provider, news.readcnt, news.similarnews, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode =social_corporations.code WHERE date=#{newsDate} AND (social_corporations.code = "tm" OR social_corporations.code = "wmp" OR social_corporations.code = "cp") GROUP BY news.id ORDER BY news.readcnt DESC, news.id ASC, CASE WHEN CODE = "tm" THEN 1 WHEN CODE = "cp" THEN 2 WHEN CODE = "wmp" THEN 3 END ASC LIMIT #{page}, 5

SELECT news.id, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode = social_corporations.code WHERE social_corporations.code=#{corpCode} AND date=#{date}

SELECT news.id, mapping_social.social_corpcode FROM news INNER JOIN mapping_social ON news.id = mapping_social.news_id INNER JOIN social_corporations ON mapping_social.social_corpcode = social_corporations.code WHERE date=#{newsDate} AND (social_corporations.code = "tm" OR social_corporations.code = "wmp" OR social_corporations.code = "cp") GROUP BY news.id ORDER BY CASE WHEN CODE = "tm" THEN 1 WHEN CODE = "cp" THEN 2 WHEN CODE = "wmp" THEN 3 END ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news(id, title, preview, DATE, image, link, provider, similarnews, readcnt) VALUES (#{newsID}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsPreview}, #{newsDate}, #{newsImage}, #{newsLink}, #{newsProvider}, #{similarNews}, 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE similarnews = #{similarNews}

INSERT INTO mapping_social(social_corpcode, news_id) SELECT #{newsSocialCorpCode}, #{newsID} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT social_corpcode, news_id FROM mapping_social WHERE social_corpcode=#{newsSocialCorpCode} AND news_id=#{newsID})
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET readcnt=readcnt+1 WHERE id=#{newsID};
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(similarnews)+COUNT(news_id) , 0) AS count FROM mapping_social mapping, news news WHERE mapping.news_id = news.id AND mapping.social_corpCode = #{socialCorpCode} and news.date = #{today}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NEWS_COUNT(DATE, corp_code, COUNT) VALUES( #{date}, #{socialCorpCode}, #{newsCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE corp_code = #{socialCorpCode}, count = #{newsCount}
